thread.title: WH says "sign of goodwill" if N. Korea released Americans

title: WH says "sign of goodwill" if N. Korea released Americans
text:
WH says "sign of goodwill" if N. Korea released Americans 4:09am IST - 00:33
The White House said on Thursday it would welcome the release of three Americans imprisoned in North Korea before a planned summit between U.S. President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un in a few weeks, but could not confirm any reports on the subject. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
